mapper.select: SELECT a.*, b.title AS tit1, c.title AS tit2 FROM `aj_product` AS a JOIN `aj_product_cate1` AS b ON a.cate1=b.cate1 JOIN `aj_product_cate2` AS c ON a.cate1=c.cate1 AND a.cate2=c.cate2 WHERE `productCode`=#{productCode};
SELECT COUNT(`productCode`) FROM `aj_product` WHERE `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND `price` BETWEEN #{min} AND #{max}
SELECT * FROM `aj_product` WHERE `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND `price` BETWEEN #{min} AND #{max} ORDER BY `price` DESC LIMIT #{start}, 16;
SELECT b.cate1, b.cate2, a.title as tit1, b.title as tit2 FROM `aj_product_cate1` AS a JOIN `aj_product_cate2` AS b ON a.cate1 = b.cate1 WHERE b.cate1=#{cate1} AND b.cate2=#{cate2};
